se.ltu.android.demo.scene.intersection
Class AABBox

java.lang.Object
  se.ltu.android.demo.scene.intersection.AABBox

public class AABBox
extends java.lang.Object

An Axis-Aligned Bounding Box that is defined by a minimum and a maximum point.

Constructor Detail

AABBox

public AABBox()
Constructs the box with points at zero

AABBox

public AABBox(float x0,
              float y0,
              float z0,
              float x1,
              float y1,
              float z1)
Constructs the box by giving it two points. This constructor will compare the point components to ensure that any component c0 is smaller than c1.

Parameters:
x0 - first x-coordinate
y0 - first y-coordinate
z0 - first z-coordinate
x1 - second x-coordinate
y1 - second y-coordinate
z1 - second z-coordinate
Method Detail

transform

public void transform(float[] matrix,
                      AABBox other)
Apply a transformation matrix on another box and set the result on this box. This box current values will be overwritten while the other box will not be touched.

Parameters:
matrix - column-major transformation matrix to apply
other - other bounding box to transform values from

isSet

public boolean isSet()
Returns:
true if this bounding box is set
